Name: Arena
About the game: Arena is about fighting to exist as your magical self Our story begins when a patrol of Kazuian guards catch you in act of practicing MAGIC. The king of Kazu is disgusted by your MAGIC and sentences you to trial by combat. You're afraid, but you are strong. You will face 16 levels full of action, adventure, romance, near-death experiences, and full-on religious epiphanies. Your body is ready. You can feel the magic flowing through you. The question is Wizard... are YOU ready? Art Features All of the textures and sprites are hand-painted (with acrylic paint) Original soundtrack Gameplay Features Magic based first-person shooter 4 unique spells + 2 spell upgrades 9 different enemy types 16 levels Earn coins in the Arena to buy new spells Leaderboards, Stats, and Achievements Continued Support I plan on continuing to support Arena in the future with new maps, new character types, and new game modes.
Meta Title: Arena: May 19, 2020, Clay Peterson and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Arena? Check out the release date (May 19, 2020), developer insights from Clay Peterson, and a complete game summary.
